text:
Palo Alto, CA right on University Ave

Full time web developer

BumeBox.com, a social media marketing platform

We are just 6 months old and are 7 people strong. As a member of the team you will develop production DHTML, CSS, and AJAX apps. Come join us if you want to get in on the ground floor. Bonus points for marketing and social media savvy.

Email me directly if interested and be sure to mention HN - nathan@bumebox.com
